meanings.sent3: The unkissed cake was the only one left at the party.
meanings.sent4: The unkissed flower wilted in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The unkissed cheek yearned for affection.

meanings.sent1: The unkissed teddy bear sat alone on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The unkissed child longed for a hug.
meanings.sent3: The unkissed sandwich was forgotten in the lunchbox.
meanings.sent4: The unkissed letter remained unopened on the table.
meanings.sent5: The unkissed lips pouted in disappointment.
